docs.text: Welcome to Certpages ¶ Your number 1 resource for all IT certifications. This website is a living document to help you pass your next certification. If you have any questions, please contact us at certpages@gmail.com

docs.text: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner ¶ Overview ¶ Exam Code: CLF-C01 Prerequisites: None Recommended Experience: None Number of Questions: 65 Test Format: Multiple choice, multiple answer Length of Test: 90 minutes Passing Score: Around 70% Test Objectives: CLF-C01 Objectives Cost: $100 Registration: Register Here Expiration: 3 years after the certification is acquired. Renewal: Take the Cloud Practitioner exam OR earn and associate-level or professional-level certification Books ¶ The Ultimate AWS® Certified Cloud Practitioner Training Manual Sybex - AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Study Guide: CLF-C01 Exam Videos ¶ Linux Academy - AWS Cloud Practitioner (CLF-C01) Udemy - Amazon Web Services (AWS) Certified 2019 - BackSpace Academy Udemy - AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner 2020 - Zeal Vora Cloud Academy - AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification Preparation CBT Nuggets - AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (CLF-C01) ITPro.tv - AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Questions ¶ Udemy - AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner 2019 Practice Questions Wizlabs - AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Other ¶ AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification Notes

docs.text: AWS Certified Developer – Associate ¶ Overview ¶ Exam Code: DVA-C01 Prerequisites: None Recommended Experience: Some experience with AWS is recommended Number of Questions: 60 Test Format: Multiple choice, multiple answer Length of Test: 130 minutes Passing Score: Around 70% Test Objectives: DVA-C01 Objectives Cost: $150 Registration: Register Here Expiration: 3 years after the certification is acquired. Renewal: Take the current Associate exam again OR Earn a AWS professional level certification Books ¶ Pearson IT - AWS Certified Developer Associate (DVA-C01) Cert Guide AWS Certified Developer – Associate Guide: Your one-stop solution to passing the AWS developer's 2019 Videos ¶ Linux Academy - AWS Certified Developer – Associate Level Udemy - Ultimate AWS Certified Developer Associate 2020 - Stephane Maarek Udemy - AWS Certified Developer - Associate 2020 - A Cloud Guru Pluralsight - AWS Certified Developer - Associate Cloud Academy - Certified Developer – Associate Certification Preparation for AWS ITPro.tv - AWS Certified Developer - Associate Questions ¶ Udemy - AWS Certified Developer Associate Practice Exams - Tutorials Dojo Udemy - AWS Certified Developer Associate 2020 - Stephane Maarek Other ¶ Certified AWS Associate Developer Notes AWS Cheat Sheets

docs.text: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional ¶ Overview ¶ Exam Code: SAP-C01 Prerequisites: None Recommended Experience: An AWS associate certification is recommended but not required. Number of Questions: 75 Test Format: Multiple choice, multiple answer Length of Test: 170 minutes Passing Score: Around 75% Test Objectives: SAP-C01 Objectives Cost: $300 Registration: Register Here Expiration: 3 years after the certification is acquired. Renewal: Take the current professional-level exam Books ¶ McGraw-Hill - WS Certified Solutions Architect Professional All-in-One Exam Guide Pearson - AWS Certified Solutions Architect Professional Exam Cert Guide Videos ¶ Linux Academy - AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional Udemy - AWS Certified Solutions Architect Professional AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional 2020 Cloud Academy -Solutions Architect – Professional Certification Preparation for AWS Questions ¶ John Bonso - AWS Certified Solutions Architect Professional Practice Exam Wizlabs - AWS Certified Solutions Architect Professional Other ¶ AWS Cheat Sheets
